rooms.Name: L.  A.     M  E  L  T  D  O  W  N
rooms.Description:
The city of Los Angeles has been overtaken by alien invaders.  Your mission
is to get to the reactor at whatever cost....and send this entire city
to hell in a billion pieces.
Here's the deal..please read:
If you die, your corpse will be brought back to this room and I will bring
you back here.  You can then loot your corpse and I will restore you.
Good luck finding the group after dying.  I may assist in this...maybe not.

rooms.Name: On a rooftop overlooking L.A.
rooms.Description:
The smoke from the smoldering buildings here downtown is thick and burns your
eyes.  You can spot several small alien craft and helocopters buzzing about
the sky.  On this rooftop you are a sitting duck.  Grab some gear and hit the
pavement.

rooms.Name: On a rooftop overlooking L.A.
rooms.Description:
The smoke from the smoldering buildings here downtown is thick and burns your
eyes.  You can spot several small alien craft and helocopters buzzing about
the sky.  On this rooftop you are a sitting duck.  Grab some gear and hit the
pavement.

rooms.Name: On the streets of L.A.
rooms.Description:
The city streets of Los Angeles lay in ruin.  The air is dense with smoke
from the burning buildings.  The entire city and maybe the entire world is
over run with alien troopers and policemen.  Their single mission is to
destroy the human race and you are Earth's only hope.

rooms.Name: In a dark alley behind a movie theatre
rooms.Description:
This alley doesn't look particularly safe.  It's dark and would be a perfect
place for someone to sneak up on you.  Inside you can hear the muffled audio
from the movie that's showing.  No reason to buy a ticket, there's surely a
rear door you can gain entry through.

rooms.Description:

rooms.Name: The emergency exit of the Theatre
rooms.Description:
You made it!  You always wanted to see "Bleach Blond Biker Bimbos" on the
big screen.  The theatre looks really run down, but in the dark...who cares!

rooms.Name: Inside the theatre
rooms.Description:
If it weren't for all these noisy, annoying aliens this theatre wouldn't
be so bad.  It has nice high ceilings and plenty of comfortable seating.
Up on the screen at the south end of the theatre, the curtains have just
opened and the movie is about to start.  Screw those upcoming attractions.
Get yourself some snacks from the concession before the feature begins.

rooms.Name: A Hallway in the theatre
rooms.Description:
Awwww yeah...don't ya just love those sticky theatre floors?  This hallway is
narrow and dim.  Judging from the way the walls are shaking, there must be
some demolition going on somewhere nearby.

rooms.Name: A Hallway in the theatre
rooms.Description:
Awwww yeah...don't ya just love those sticky theatre floors?  This hallway is
narrow and dim.  Judging from the way the walls are shaking, there must be
some demolition going on somewhere nearby.

rooms.Name: A Hallway in the theatre
rooms.Description:
Awwww yeah...don't ya just love those sticky theatre floors?  This hallway is
narrow and dim.  Judging from the way the walls are shaking, there must be
some demolition going on somewhere nearby.

rooms.Name: The concession
rooms.Description:
They have all the good stuff to eat here.  Popcorn, candy, nachos, and pizza
are all available.  But, don't piss off those guys working the counter tonight.
They can be very unpleasant.

rooms.Name: The concession
rooms.Description:

are all available.  But, don't piss off those guys working the counter tonight.
They can be very unpleasant.

rooms.Name: The concession
rooms.Description:

are all available.  But, don't piss off those guys working the counter tonight.
They can be very unpleasant.

rooms.Name: A Surveillance room
rooms.Description:
It's a shame that such high security measures are neccessary.  This area
has all the video screens for monitoring the entire theatre...inside
and outside.

rooms.Name: Behind the counter
rooms.Description:

are all available.  But, don't piss off those guys working the counter tonight.
They can be very unpleasant.

rooms.Name: The hallway to the arcade
rooms.Description:
Awwww yeah...don't ya just love those sticky theatre floors?  This hallway is
narrow and dim.  Judging from the way the walls are shaking, there must be
some demolition going on somewhere nearby.

rooms.Name: The hallway to the arcade
rooms.Description:
Awwww yeah...don't ya just love those sticky theatre floors?  This hallway is
narrow and dim.  Judging from the way the walls are shaking, there must be
some demolition going on somewhere nearby.

rooms.Name: The arcade elevator
rooms.Description:
All righty, they have all the good games here to challenge you.  Ooooh,
there's even a Duke Nukem game tucked over in the corner.

rooms.Name: The stairs to the projection room
rooms.Description:
You can hear the hum of the projector in the background.  Music to a
movie fans ears.  Ever wonder what it takes to put those movies up
on the big screen?  Now's your chance to find out.

rooms.Name: The stairs to the projection room
rooms.Description:

movie fans ears.  Ever wonder what it takes to put those movies up
on the big screen?  Now's your chance to find out.

rooms.Name: A restricted area
rooms.Description:
You aren't supposed to be here.  But, what the hell, you've made it
this far.  You may as well check to see where that dark hallway leads.

rooms.Name: A restricted area
rooms.Description:
You aren't supposed to be here.  But, what the hell, you've made it
this far.  You may as well check to see where that dark hallway leads.

rooms.Name: A secret hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway is very narrow and dark.  You turn sideways and shuffle
just to move through it.  You can see daylight up ahead though.  Gotta be
a good sign. Doesn't it?

rooms.Name: A secret hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway is very narrow and dark.  You turn sideways and shuffle
just to move through it.  You can see daylight up ahead though.  Gotta be
a good sign. Doesn't it?

rooms.Name: The bridge to the reactor
rooms.Description:
This narrow bridge isn't constructed with safety in mind.  It's about
2 feet wide with no handrails.  Down below, you can see the back exit
of the theatre and ahead is the reactor.

rooms.Name: The bridge to the reactor
rooms.Description:
This narrow bridge isn't constructed with safety in mind.  It's about
2 feet wide with no handrails.  Down below, you can see the back exit
of the theatre and ahead is the reactor.

rooms.Description:

rooms.Name: Mission Completed
rooms.Description:
Give yourself a big pat on the back.  You've destroyed the reactor
along with this lousy town and made a giant leap toward saving the world.
Your mission is completed....... for now anyway.

rooms.Name: The Xmen testing Arena
rooms.Description: This is a test.  This is only a test, not to be confused with the real thing. =)
